thread.title: This video of a little girl mistaking a water heater for a robot is wi
thread.title_full: This video of a little girl mistaking a water heater for a robot is wi

author: Team Social
title: This video of a little girl mistaking a water heater for a robot is wi
text:
This video of a little girl mistaking a water heater for a robot is winning hearts online. So much so, that it has been watched by over 400,000 users on YouTube.
The video begins with a little girl known as Rayna, stumbling across a water heater in the street, which she mistakes for a robot.
Rayna, who is clearly excited by her discovery keeps on repeating: “Hi, robot!”
All this while looking at the robot’s ‘face'(Well!).
Incidentally, Rayna can’t quite pronounce her ‘r’s and ‘l’s, as so she keeps muttering: “I wuv you, wobot.” Trust us, it’s damn cute!
And just when you think it can’t get more adorable than this, she does something magical. Without thinking, she gives a loving hug to her inanimate friend.
If you want to see Rayna meeting her robot friend for the first time, you can watch the video here:
